alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:24PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Chautauqua County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1123 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Erie, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Westfield, Lakewood, Mayville, Clymer, Long Point State Park, Chautauqua Institution, Lake Erie State Park, Findley Lake, SUNY Fredonia, Jamestown West, Chautauqua, Busti, Portland, Ripley, Stockton, Brocton, Celoron and Mina. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 59 and 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
